sentences.sContent: Quentin’s mood seems to vary according to the weather.
sentences.sCn: 昆廷的情绪似乎随天气而变化。

sentences.sContent: ‘What do you wear when you go out?’ ‘Well, it varies.’
sentences.sCn: “你出门的时候通常穿什么衣服？”“噢，得看情况。"

sentences.sContent: ...Discipline techniques vary by education level: 8% of those with a postgraduate degree say they often beat their children...
...Views on the topic vary greatly among people from different walks of life...
...whose sizes vary from several square meters to several square kilometers...
...Opinions vary when it comes to the impact of social networking websites on reading...
...learning does vary a lot between individual students...
...the fact that states vary at least as much in test scores as do developed countries...

phrases.pCn: 在……方面变化；在……方面有差异

words.tran: 变量的；可变的；易变的，多变的；变异的，[生物] 畸变的
多变的；各式各样的；杂色的
[数] 变量；可变物，可变因素
可变性，变化性；[生物][数] 变异性
改变；使多样化（vary的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: if something varies, it changes depending on the situation
